targets.query: SELECT sum(value) FROM "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_num_devices" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(none) order by time desc limit 1
SELECT mean(value) FROM "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(none) order by time desc /*limit 1*/
select value * 100 from alameda_gpu..overall_gpu_memory_utilizatin where $timeFilter order by time desc limit 1
SELECT sum(value) FROM "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_memory_total_bytes" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(none) order by time desc limit 1

panels.description: The count of nodes that used less than $memory_utilization  of memory

targets.query: select count(host) from (select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value <= $memory_utilization

panels.title: Nodes of Low GPU Memory Utilization (<$memory_utilization)

panels.description: Low GPU memory utilization smaller than (<$memory_utilization)

targets.query: select host, value from (select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value <= $memory_utilization

panels.title: Low GPU Memory Utilization (<$memory_utilization)

targets.query: select * from (select count(host) from (select mean(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host, time(30s)) where value <= $memory_utilization group by time(30s))

panels.title: Number of Nodes with Low GPU Memory Utilization (<$memory_utilization)

panels.description: The count of nodes that used less than $gpu_utilization of GPU cycles

targets.query: select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value) as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where avg <= $gpu_utilization group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Nodes of Low GPU Cycle Utilization (<$gpu_utilization)

targets.query: select host, avg from (select last(avg) as avg from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(-1)) where avg <> -0.01 group by host) where avg < $gpu_utilization

select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value) as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where avg <= $gpu_utilization group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Number of Nodes with Low GPU Cycle Utilization (<$gpu_utilization)

panels.description: The count of nodes that used more than $high_memory_utilization  of memory

targets.query: select count(host) from(select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value >= $high_memory_utilization

panels.title: Nodes of High GPU Memory Utilization (>$high_memory_utilization)

panels.description: High GPU memory utilization larger than (>$high_memory_utilization)

targets.query: select host, value from (select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value >= $high_memory_utilization

panels.title: High GPU Memory Utilization (>$high_memory_utilization)

targets.query: select * from (select count(host) from (select mean(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host, time(30s)) where value >= $high_memory_utilization group by time(30s))

panels.title: Number of Nodes with High GPU Memory Utilization (>$high_memory_utilization)

panels.description: The count of node that used over $high_gpu_utilization GPU Utilization

targets.query: select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where avg >= $high_gpu_utilization group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Nodes of High GPU Cycle Utilization (>$high_gpu_utilization)

panels.description: High GPU cycle utilization larger than (>$high_gpu_utilization)

targets.query: select last(avg) as avg from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval)) where avg > $high_gpu_utilization group by host

panels.title: High GPU Cycle Utilization (>$high_gpu_utilization)

targets.query: select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where avg >= $high_gpu_utilization group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Number of Nodes with High GPU Cycle Utilization (>$high_gpu_utilization)

targets.query: select sum("value") from alameda_gpu..gpu_counting_k8s where $timeFilter group by time(5m), "NodeName"  fill(none) order by time desc limit 1

panels.title: GPU Used for Pod in Node
